text: Curious if anyone here knows of a `placeholder`  parameter for the default blog_subscribe module @ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/default-modules#blog-email-subscription>, I see the other similar modules have one spelled out, just curious if the blog sub had a similar one lingering.

The blog subscribe module basically pulls the blog subscription form that’s generated in the forms tool. So if you’d like to enter placeholder text into form fields open the forms tool, find the form edit the form field.
I was just about to check there - and makes sense, thanks for following up!
